newsitem.title: NORWAY: Norway 4-month T-bill gets high yield of 4.04 pct.
newsitem.headline: Norway 4-month T-bill gets high yield of 4.04 pct.

text.p: Norway's central bank, Norges Bank, said on Thursday the auction of the new four-month treasury bill, SS49, produced a highest yield of 4.04 percent.
The lowest yield at the ordinary auction was 3.97 percent and the weighted average was 4.01 percent. Bids for the highest accepted rate had a 46.0 percent allotment.
Norges Bank announced last Friday the ad-hoc issue of the new T-bill for 5.5 billion crowns with 500 million crowns reserved for the bank.
The T-bill has a nominal interest rate of four percent and matures on November 17, 1997.
